name: Async Messaging Demo
description: Demonstrates sync/async annotations with timeouts and message queues
diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    title: Order Processing with Async Events
    participant Client
    participant API as API Gateway
    participant DB as Database
    participant Queue as Message Queue
    participant Analytics
    participant Email as Email Service

    Client->>API: Create Order @sync @type(JSON) @path(POST /api/orders)
    API->>DB: Query User @sync @timeout(100ms)
    DB-->>API: User Data @sync
    API->>DB: Save Order @sync @timeout(200ms)
    DB-->>API: Order Saved @sync
    API-->>Queue: Emit OrderCreated @async @queue(order-events)
    Queue-->>Analytics: Process Analytics @async @queue(analytics)
    Queue-->>Email: Send Confirmation @async @queue(notifications)
    API-->>Client: Order Created @sync
